text: Aur uss halat ko yaad kero! Jab tum zamin mein qaleel thay kamzor shumar kiye jatay thay. Iss andeshay mein rehtay thay kay tum ko log noch khasot na len so Allah ney tum ko rehney ki jagah di aur tum ko apni nusrat say qooat di aur tum ko nafees nafees cheezen ata farmaeen takay tum shukar kero
